LanguageData.Weapon_CGearGrenadeFrag.label: TC Frag Grenades
LanguageData.Weapon_CGearGrenadeFrag.description: Charged fragmentation grenades. They can be thrown a short distance, where they'll explode.
LanguageData.Weapon_CGearGrenadeFrag.verbs.0.label: throw frag grenade
LanguageData.Proj_CGear_GrenadeFrag.label: TC Frag grenade
